sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { Button } from "../components/ui"; import { HeroSection, FeaturesGrid, Navigation, Footer, PricingGrid, StatsSection, TestimonialStats, DietPlansCarousel, AutoDeliveryBanner, BudgetDietPlans, RecipeIntegration, LocalPartnerships, DietCompatibilityChecker, PantrySync, } from "../components/ui"; const LandingPage = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); return (
{/* Navigation */} {/* Hero Section */} {/* Features Section */}

Why Choose NutriCart?

We combine cutting-edge AI technology with nutrition science to make healthy eating simple, sustainable, and enjoyable for everyone.

{/* Budget-Friendly Diet Plans */} {/* Diet Plans Carousel */} {/* Recipe Integration */} {/* Local Partnerships */} {/* Diet Compatibility Checker */} {/* AI Pantry Sync */} {/* Auto-Delivery Banner */} {/* Stats Section */} {/* Testimonials */} {/* Pricing Section */}

Start Your Health Journey Today

Start your health journey with our flexible pricing options. No hidden fees, cancel anytime, and get started for free.

{/* Final CTA */}

Ready to Transform Your Health?

Join thousands of users who have already achieved their health goals with NutriCart.

{/* Footer */}
); }; export default LandingPage;
